summary: Frontend testing of Frontal Wave Style Configurator. CRITICAL ISSUE: Size labels (Full 16.5", Cob 15.5", Pony 14.5") are still visible on the frontal image despite requirement to remove them. All other features working correctly: crystals visible with sprite sheet images, positioned on white dots, sizes work correctly (XL:42, Full:35, Cob:30, Poney:25), pattern repetition works, mobile/tablet responsive, Shopify export functional.

issues: CRITICAL: Size labels 'Full 16.5", Cob 15.5", Pony 14.5"' are still visible on the browband-wave.png image. Requirement states these should be removed. A browband-wave-clean.png (28758 bytes) file exists but the app uses browband-wave.png (44308 bytes) which still contains the text labels.

passed_tests: 19 rhinestone crystal types available in selection grid
Crystals visible with real images via sprite sheet (background-image)
Crystals positioned on white dots using percentage coordinates
Pattern repetition working (alternating colors across positions)
Export button disabled when no stones selected
Export button enabled when stones selected
Export modal opens with HTML Shopify code (1933+ chars)
Copy button present with correct text 'Copier le code'
Mobile responsiveness (390x844) - layout correct, crystals visible
Tablet responsiveness (768x1024) - layout correct, crystals visible
failed_tests: Size text labels (Full/Cob/Pony) should be removed from frontal image - FAILED: text still visible
action_items: Replace browband-wave.png with a clean version without size labels (Full 16.5", Cob 15.5", Pony 14.5")
Check if browband-wave-clean.png is the correct cleaned image and update FRONTAL_URL to use it, OR regenerate the clean image
critical_code_review_comments: FRONTAL_URL in App.js points to /browband-wave.png which still contains size labels
A browband-wave-clean.png file exists (28758 bytes) - verify if this is the cleaned version
WHITE_DOTS array has 42 positions, DOT_DIAMETER_PCT=1.8 for crystal sizing

success_rate.frontend: 95% - All features work except image text labels

context_for_next_testing_agent: Main issue is the frontal image still shows size labels. Check /app/frontend/public/ for browband-wave-clean.png as potential clean version. Crystal positioning uses WHITE_DOTS array with percentage coordinates. Sprite sheet at SPRITE_URL for crystal images. DOT_DIAMETER_PCT=1.8 controls crystal size on preview.
